divs: Sighting DetailsI was at shopping center Marshalls getting Christmas gifts, then I exited the shopping center around 5:40 pm. I made a left onto Waverly Ave, that would be going North. As I was driving up Waverly Avenue, I noticed a Glowing orange Orb of Light. This was no plane, or helicopter. I thought it might be a balloon, but it was already dark outside. I knew it was a UFO, because It was emitting a pulse of orange energy. It was traveling at around 90 degrees from the eastern sky about 500 feet, then went in a straight line going west. I did not have a phone to take a picture, but there were other cars that saw the UFO, and also pulled off the road, to get out of their cars, and look at the UFO. I felt amazing, because I feel that I was lucky to have seen one. I always had a feeling they were out there, but I very much feel lucky. I lost sight of the object, because after about 5 minutes, while traveling east, it went past the tree line, so I couldnt see it anymore.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Holbrook
There were no other sightings in Holbrook on or around December 23rd 2012
Summary: I was driving down Waverly Avenue north of Sunrise Highway when I saw a glowing orange orb float from the west, slowly going east.
